result.execSummary:
The defendant Colin R Valadez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Colin R Valadez is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Colin R Valadez was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Case completion
Cash bond applied; partial refund;   ds/nr/cs   ck#18CH080925

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Lauren Breckenfelder.  5 days KCJ, credit for time served 5 days.  Fees & costs are due during the period of probation on 18CF564.  Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.  Clerk D. Smith.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Lauren Breckenfelder.  The State just extended an offer encompasses both files.  Atty. Breckenfelder is requesting an adjournment to discuss that with her client.  Sentencing rescheduled to 6/7/18 @ 9:00.  Bond cont'd.  Clerk D. Smith.

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Def. appeared with Atty Lauren Breckenfelder.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Parties have reached an agreement.  Count 1 - Parties will stipulate to revoking the hold open agreement.  Entry of judgment and sentencing hearing 4/19/18 at 10:00.  Bond continued.

records.addlTxt: Atty Lauren Breckenfelder

128pm  State appears by Special Prosecutor Thaddeus McGuire.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Lauren Breckenfelder.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Not Guilty Plea previously entered.  Deft demands jury trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 10, 2017 at 02:10 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 28, 2018 at 08:30 am.  Warrant vacated.  $1000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  kmk
DE in custody and appearing today at 1pm Intake.
Special Prosecutor K. Richard Wells appeared for the State.  Atty Kristyne Watson appeared for def.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Def. did not appear.  Bench warrant to issue with a $1,000.00 cash bond.
Atty Kristyne Watson
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing on January 6, 2017 at 08:30 am.  Date changed from 12/22/16 at 9:00 on the Court's own motion.
Stipulated Hold Open Agreement  kmk

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Rufo.  Victim rights notification has been complied with.  The DE enters a plea of guilty to ct 1, found guilty.  However, judgment is not entered at this time.  Ct. 2 is dismissed.  The parties are entering into a 12 month hold open agreement.  If the DE is successful with the agreement, Ct. 1 will be dismissed & an ordinance will be issued.  Sentencing 12/22/16 @ 9:00.  Clerk D. Smith.

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Def. appeared with Atty Andrea Rufo.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  No plea agreement reached.  FPT 12/22/15 at 8:50 (last adjournment).  If not resolved at 12/22/15 hearing, case to be scheduled for jury trial.  Bond continued.
Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Rufo is out on medical leave.  PLEAH adjourned to 12/1/15 at 9:40am.  Bond continued.
Plea hearing at 12-01-2015 09:40 am

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State. Defendant, Colin R Valadez, appeared with Attorney Lauren Breckenfelder specially for Attorney Andrea Rufo today.  Clerk: PT
Atty Breckenfelder states case will be resolved and requests another date for a plea on behalf of Atty Rufo.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 10, 2015 at 09:10 am.
Final pre-trial at 10-08-2015 10:50 am

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Atty Kristyne Watson appeared specially for Atty Andrea K Rufo and for Defendant, Colin R Valadez, who does not appear.  Clerk: PT
No appearance by the Defendant.  Atty Watson appears specially for Atty Rufo who is out ill today.  Court authorizes a Bench Warrant with a $2000, but will stay warrant until Monday at which time bond will be forfeited.

DE is now present in court 20 minutes late stating he had trouble locating this court.  Court vacates the authorization of a warrant and bond will not be forfeited.  Atty Watson requests an adjournment on behalf of Atty Rufo with no objection by the State.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 8, 2015 at 10:50 am.
